Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can be endlessly queried. Teachers will provide a single comment and any further clarification needs to be done over email as rarely are my tutors the ones to mark my assignments.
